title: FPS drop on Mac HighSierra
body:
Hello team Support and users!

I have a FPS drop issue on my Mac. I hope I can find the reason and fix it. And if u guys have same or similar problems, pls share ur situations/solutions. 

processer: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i5
RAM: 16GB 2400 MHz DDR4
Graphic card: Radeon Pro 575 4 GB
512GB SSD

so those are my IMac specs. and I believe that it can run League of Legends without any problems.
but there are problem with stressful FPS drop. but my ping stays 20-30. so I think it is not internet issue.

symptoms

1. every sounds are gone. even if my sounds option was not muted and my speakers are working. I could hear discord.
after few minutes
2. FPS drops to 20-30 when I move my screen on minimap.
after few minutes
3. FPS drops to 2-5. doesn't matter what I'm doing.
4. I can't leave the game normal. so I have to force to shutdown every time.

there were just discord, League of Legends, League of Legends launcher, and safari when I'm playing the match.

I can play Starcraft 2, diablo3, Heroes of the Storm, Don't starve together, This war of mine without any technical problems.
I already deleted and downloaded League of Legends twice and did full repair too but still drops FPS.

pls help me! 
and it's little late but happy new year! :)

replies.body: Thanks for the detailed info here, it sounds like a crappy case but we'd like to help!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you get a chance so our tech team can investigate closely then find some options for you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!

It's definitely a League issue and not Mac. I troubleshooted with "Player Support" for well over a month after buying the best iMac currently being made and the game still drops frames. How about we talk to someone who isn't just an email troubleshooter!

Hello!

High Sierra
MacBook Pro 13-inch, 2017
2,3 GHz Intel Core i5
16 GB 2133 MHz LPDDR3
Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 1536 MB

To have better FPS I watched this video that helped me a lot:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f5eVBpXaVe4

Per example: As it seems my retina display only holds up to 60FPS so no need to ask more of my graphics card.


But this wasn't the main subject, and the problems start when I try to use Discord. The game sound goes away and everytime a game finishes my mac freezes and I have to manually restart it.


So I also have the same problem.
Please help.

Regards,
Ximbalau
Hi ! I have the same problem. Everything worked fine yesterday, then I downloaded the new High Sierra iOS update and now I'm spiking to 30 fps every game.
